reviewText: VERY GOOD INFORMATION; SOMETHING YOU DON'T HEAR ANYWHERE ELSE.

Very informative and went into much detail to let you know that you do have choices and that you don't have to be at the mercy of the doctor.  I feel everyone should watch these dvd's.
This is a great DVD collection, very informative. I highly recommend buying it.
A must view for anyone with cancer.

Very valuable collection of videos about a very timely subject, health, cancer and obesity. Hopefully more information like this will get out by which we, as a nation, will be able to turn around the nation's health. What's amazing about this it the fix costs next to nothing and every day there is more and more evidence that it actually works. We all have to eat, just change what we eat is the fix.

Great information!  A must for anyone who cares about their health & wellness!!
I purchased the set to keep around for loaners to friends.  What a wonderful resource.  It's most unfortunate that our medical community doesn't agree with most of the information in these films

Very helpful!!
I didn't know it was on a blue cd. My. Computer doesn't read it so, I gave it to a friend that can see it.

I wanted to see these documentaries for such a long time and I wasn't disappointed.  Great information about a fantastic natural therapy to cure all ills.  I think it is worth getting for the knowledge and the science behind it.  I have leant it out to a few of my clients who are suffering from a range of illnesses to open their minds to alternative therapies.
If you are suffering cancer, diabetes or any other major illness, I recommend you arm yourself with knowledge, watch movies like these and read the books too.  That way you are in a better position to make a decision about your health and your life.
If your sick you need to watch this and learn that the body can heal itself!
Very eye-opening.
